-e ---

𐀴 ti 𔗽 𔗼 Δ di •“tip/top of tongue”

𐀴 ti 󲏥 󲅵 •Ti @ Cretan

𐀴 ti •tri three 3 𐀴 in 𐚩 𐚫 𐚪 𐚨 𐃠 TRI tripod

𐀴-𐀪 ti-ri three 𐀴 ⋍ ൩ ⋍ ๓ ⋍ ༣ ⋍ ੩ ⋍ ३ ⋍ ٣ = 3 (turned)
𐀴-𐀪-𐀵 ti-ri-to third, dritte
𐀴-𐀪-𐀡-𐀆 ti-ri-po-de tripod
𐀴-𐀪-𐀮-𐀫-𐀁 ti-ri-se-ro-e thrice-hero

t- 𐀲 ta 𐀳 te 𐀴 ti 𐀵 to 𐀶 tu

𐀴 ti ≈ 𐀠 di 𐘦 DE 𐘆 DI
𐀠 pit feet in

𐀤-𐀵-𐀫-𐀡-𐀠 qe-to-ro po-di quatro-pod τετράποδα

𔗽 𐀴 ti tip top tongue lingua 𔗽 /la/ trifola < tūbera tapypi tu'wi 𔗹
𔗼 𐀴 di Δ δορίαλλος doríallos Gender
